= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Feeder salivatory glands* (feeder-salivation)
   * *Feeder - parotid gland* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_OTG AVA.PN.PSYM.OTG] -> parotid-gland): produces 25% of saliva in oral cavity, mostly serous
   * *Feeder - submandibular gland* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_SXG AVA.PN.PSYM.SXG] -> submandibular-gland): produces 70% of saliva in oral cavity, mixed serous (moisturing) and mucous (process food)
   * *Feeder - sublingual gland* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_SXG AVA.PN.PSYM.SXG] -> sublingual-gland): produces 5% of saliva in oral cavity, mostly mucous
  * *Feeder taste sensation* (mouth-taste-sensation)
   * *Feeder - tongue gustatory hair cell* (tongue-hair-cell -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_TRG AVA.PN.SG.TRG]): taste sensation
   * *Feeder - epiglottis* (epiglottis-taste-buds -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_NOD AVA.PN.SG.NOD]): taste sensation
   * *Feeder - soft palate sparse taste receptors* (soft-palate-sparse-taste-receptors -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_GNG AVA.PN.SG.GNG]): taste sensation
  * *Feeder tongue muscles* (tongue-muscles)
   * *Feeder - genioglossus muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] -> genioglossus-muscle): keeps airway open and enables tongue to stick out and retract
   * *Feeder - hyoglossus muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] -> hyoglossus-muscle): depress and retract the tongue, important in singing
   * *Feeder - styloglossus muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] -> styloglossus-muscle): chewing, talking, suckling, and many other functions of tongue
   * *Feeder - chondroglossus muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] -> chondroglossus-muscle): depresses tongue
   * *Feeder - palatoglossus muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> palatoglossus-muscle): raising the back part of the tongue
   * *Feeder - transverse muscle of tongue* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] -> transverse-tongue-muscle): narrows and elongates tongue
   * *Feeder - vertical muscle of tongue* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] -> vertical-tongue-muscle): flattens tongue
   * *Feeder - inferior longitudinal muscle of tongue* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] -> tongue-inferior-longitudinal-muscle): shortens, retracts, pulls tip downward
   * *Feeder - stylohyoid muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> stylohyoid-muscle): draw hyoid bone backwards and elevate tongue; elevate the hyoid during swallowing
   * *Feeder - superior longitudinal muscle of tongue* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] -> superior-longitudinal-muscle-tongue): shortens, turns tip upward, turns lateral margins upward
  * *Feeder swallowing muscles and helper components* (swallowing-muscles)
   * *Feeder - digastric muscle, facial* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> digastric-muscle-facial): opens the jaw when the masseter and the temporalis are relaxed
   * *Feeder - digastric muscle, trigeminal* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] -> digastric-muscle-trigeminal): opens the jaw when the masseter and the temporalis are relaxed
   * *Feeder - geniohyoid muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_SC_VH_SAN HMA.SC.VH.SAN] -> geniohyoid-muscle): carry hyoid bone and the tongue upward during deglutition
   * *Feeder - mylohyoid muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] -> mylohyoid-muscle): raises oral cavity floor, elevates hyoid, depresses mandible
   * *Feeder - inferior pharyngeal constrictor muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> inferior-pharyngeal-constrictor-muscle): swallowing
   * *Feeder - middle pharyngeal constrictor muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> middle-pharyngeal-constrictor-muscle): swallowing
   * *Feeder - superior pharyngeal constrictor muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> superior-pharyngeal-constrictor-muscle): swallowing
   * *Feeder - uvula receptors* (uvula-receptors -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_TRG AVA.PN.SG.TRG]): preventing food from entering the nasal cavity
   * *Feeder - musculus uvulae muscle* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_PTG AVA.PN.PSYM.PTG] -> uvulae-muscle): elevates and retracts the uvula, thickening the central part of the soft palate; shortens and broadens the uvula
   * *Feeder - levator veli palatini muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> levator-veli-palatini-muscle): elevates soft palate
   * *Feeder - tensor veli palatini muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] -> tensor-veli-palatini-muscle): tension of the soft palate
  * *Feeder chewing muscles* (chewing-muscles)
   * *Feeder - teeth* (teeth -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_TRG AVA.PN.SG.TRG]): chewing
   * *Feeder - masseter muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] -> masticatory-masseter-muscle): elevation (as in closing of the mouth) and retraction of mandible
   * *Feeder - lateral pterygoid muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] -> masticatory-lateral-pterygoid-muscle): depresses mandible
   * *Feeder - medial pterygoid muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] -> masticatory-medial-pterygoid-muscle): elevates mandible, closes jaw, helps lateral pterygoids in moving the jaw from side to side
   * *Feeder - temporal muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] -> masticatory-temporal-muscle): elevation and retraction of mandible
   * *Feeder - proprioception receptors of masticatory muscles* (masticatory-unconscious-muscle-spindles -> [BrainRegionHMA_MM_MSTR HMA.MM.MSTR]): unconscious proprioception from muscle spindles; monosynaptic masticatory reflex
